website_summaries.verdict: The sleek profile and sturdy construction will appeal to those looking for a slimmer cell phone case.
pros: The case is made of non-slip polycarbonate
It's a hard case that feels rubberized and has ample openings for access to buttons
cons: May not protect the screen if the phone is dropped directly on the screen

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of this case so far. For being so thin, it's actually very sturdy. I've dropped my phone a handful of times (at a safe distance) and the case took a very long time to break. I had the first case for a couple years before it cracked around the bevel, and it's such a good price that I just ordered a new one. The material makes holding your phone MUCH easier, I have such a good grip even while filming out and about like at concerts and stuff. I will be ordering again if/when my current case breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: The color is spot on with the color of the phone and I kind of like fact that it doesn't have a screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Needed a slim case for my iPhone 6 so that I can use it in the holder of my drone transmitter and this worked perfectly. The previous case was too thick but this is just right and I don't have to worry about the phone slipping out. The color is spot on with the color of the phone and I kind of like fact that it doesn't have a screen protector. Has a more positive feel when tapping on the screen without the protector and I don't get all the smudges I got with my previous case. Can't beat the price and it was shipped quickly as usual. Awesome case...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Are you looking for a case that protects or one that looks good?
customer_reviews.text: I shattered my screen on the first drop with this case installed. Here is the run down on this case: The good: Spigen makes great stylish cases Some of the cases are better than others This is a slim line case that offers protection to the back and sides of the phone. The bad: It doesn't protect the screen or the top or bottom of the phone. There is no buffer at all for the screen If you are looking to protect your phone run from this case.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: Great case--almost like no case at all yet just enough added grip
customer_reviews.text: This case is excellent. I upgraded to an iPhone 6 from a 5 and was a little concerned about how slippery the phone felt in my hand while texting. I wanted a very minimalist case and decided to try this one. I've never been satisfied with a case on previous iPhones before as I found them too bulky or they wouldn't allow the phone to slide easily in and out of my pocket. This case is great. It provides just enough grip to avoid the feeling that the phone might slip from my hand but its bulk is negligible and it still slides easily into and out of my pocket. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Worrell

customer_reviews.title: Works well, feels great – not as durable as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: It's a good case overall. I wanted a minimal design, and this definitely fit the bill. Unfortunately, though, it does sacrifice durability as a result. I've had the case for about 6 months, and small fractures are starting to occur in the corners and button cutout areas from normal use (no drops). I have been able to increase longevity with super glue in some spots, but I don't see this case making it another 6 months. The texture is great and it does exactly what I need it to do – I just wish it would last longer. But for 10 bucks, I suppose I can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: dburls

customer_reviews.title: The fit and look is OK
customer_reviews.text: The fit and look is OK, but the buttons are not as responsive as I have experienced in the past with other cases. Also, while the idea of a little cover that protects the mini-plug jack seems like a good idea, I find it to be annoying to have to remove it when trying to plug a cord into the jack. I've never had an issue with dirt getting into that jack, so its functionality is questionable in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Frankster

customer_reviews.title: shattered my screen
customer_reviews.text: Dropped my phone about a foot and the screen shattered, cost $168 for a replacement so I'd say this case isn't going to protect your phone. I'm still using it now with a tempered glass screen protector because I hate bulky cases, after a second (higher drop) the phone stayed intact but I had to replace the $30 tempered glass screen protector. Basically I think iPhone is crap and happen to like this case. I had similar drops with HTC and Samsung phones and never broke a screen without protection.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service. Very reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. It has the slightest rubbery feel which makes it feel comfortable in your hand and does not get stuck in your pockets. UPDATED: I reached out to the company after a year's worth of use had caused the area above the rear camera a bit. They were fantastic and got right back to me and offered to send me a replacement. Replacement came and I am the happy new owner of a very slim yet durable protector for an iPhone 6. Also, this case has just the slightest amount of tackiness to it that allow it to feel comfortable in your hand without the fear of dropping it. Great customer service. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Deieso

customer_reviews.title: This case hates your phone
customer_reviews.text: I think everyone would agree that a case should primarily protect your phone. Looks should be secondary. This case puts form over function. This case is slick, both in looks and in the finish of the plastic. That means that it'll slip out of everything -- your hands, your pocket, your armband... In the week I've had this case, my phone has fallen to the ground more than the whole year I've owned my phone. Now for the first time I have scratches on my phone. If you hate your phone, buy this case
customer_reviews.author: PDX Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim Case, fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Case fits perfect, very snug, buttons function just fine. I bought the Spigen "Slim Armor" case as well which is bulkier, but I needed this case to be able to dock my iPhone 6 in an iHome docking cradle, I had to remove the Slim Armor case to get it to fit in the cradle. This case is very slim and provides minimal protection, so if you are prone to dropping your phone or it gets a lot of wear and tear, I'd recommend a "beefier" case such as the Spigen Slim Armor case. But for me, I tend to be careful and this case meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: GlowBlue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent slim case with grip
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered a case from Incase. It was bulkier, provided more drop protection but it looked terrible covering the super sleek design of my iPhone 6 so I bought a Spigen one. The Spigen case is impossibly slim fitting, provides a really good non-slip grip texture and it gets me tons of compliments all the time. As far as drop protection goes I don't think that that is this case's strong suit, but then again, I have yet to drop my phone while it's in the case. If you're looking for something extremely thin with added grip, I'd definitely recommend ordering one of these cases!
customer_reviews.author: P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight protection for the iPhone 6 -- so snug-fitting and lightweight you hardly know it's there. I wanted a non-bulky case so I could carry the phone comfortably in my front pocket, and this is it! The front of the phone is exposed, but the edges of the case extend a little beyond the surface of the phone, so the screen gets some protection. Easy access to all buttons -- no issues with usability. This case may not be stout enough to protect your phone in the event of serious impact, but otherwise this is a very handy and economical option.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case! Minimalist and an indent on the inside for magnetic phone holder plate
customer_reviews.text: Great case! I've been using it for many months now and have had many drops of my phone. It has some nicks on the corners now, but it has done exactly what it was supposed to -- which is protecting my phone itself from those nicks! It's very minimalist (which I love) and as an added bonus it has a little indent on the center of the inside to hold a metal plate for those magnetic phone holders. I didn't even know this originally but I use one of those, so it is absolutely perfect!! No complaints whatsoever and I would recommend this case to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B

customer_reviews.title: It's hard clear plastic and doesn't add too much thickness to the phone which is nice. It's very easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Just got this case for my iPhone(4.7) last night. Pro: It's very simple and elegant. It's hard clear plastic and doesn't add too much thickness to the phone which is nice. It's very easy to put on. It fits perfectly. Con It's very slippery. One of these days I know I am gonna drop it bcz of that. That's brings me to my 2nd pt. Being hard plastic, it doesn't feel like it can obsorb a hard drop impact that well. It feels like any impact on the case, the force would transfer to the phone. It doesn't have that cushion feel to it. But I think it works very well to prevent scratches thought. Overall it looks very nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Weikang

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cover - I chose it amongst many other ones ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover - I chose it amongst many other ones I tried out: - It is thin, tight on the phone, and aesthetically pleasing - You can still feel the soft contours of the iPhone 6 - It provides some basic protection for the phone - Both the screen and camera no longer will touch a surface All of the other covers seemed too bulky, too rubbery, or otherwise too soft to provide any real protection. This cover does not protect the screen directly, but the back and corners of the phone seem protected.
customer_reviews.author: Soroush

customer_reviews.title: I love this case but it's not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: This case is great for being this and the matte finish but it isn't necessarily the best case. It comes down to what you want. I like this case because it's thin and I don't tend to drop my phone so it works for me. It handles falls well but there are no cushions on the inside of the case so who knows if it's doing any damage to the phone.
customer_reviews.author: dnlgjmnz

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the case you want, if you want a case on your iPhone 6, but as minimal of a case as possible. Was a little bummed that the case didn't fully cover the top edge of the phone (maybe I missed that in the description or in the pics). Other minor complaint is that the case is a little slippery in my hand. Hasn't caused me to drop my phone. Yet. I do like the fact that the opening around the camera lens has enough of a lip that when the phone is flat, the lens isn't touching surface. So those two "complaints", made me only give it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: E. Aris

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second credit card case from Spigen. They're the best quality. I love that I can take a credit card and ID in my phone and that's all I need. No wallet or purse needed. I get tons of compliments and everyone wants to know where I got my case. They all say "what a great idea". I don't think I'll ever go back to a traditional case. My only tiny complaint is that this case is very slick and sometimes I have some trouble sliding the card slot open because of that. But it's not a big enough issue to bother me.
customer_reviews.author: AliDero

customer_reviews.title: iPhone case is perfect in all but one respect
customer_reviews.text: iPhone case is perfect in all but one respect. Love the soft texture surface -- allows a much surer grip on the phone, and looks nice. Case fits snugly, controls are accessible. I would rate it 5* except that the side edges of the case protrude above the front surface of my iPhone6 slightly (just under 1mm). The case packaging was stickered after the fact indicating it is compatible with 6/6s; I imagine it would fit the slightly thicker 6s perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Okay but be careful when selecting your color, other options change
customer_reviews.text: I started looking at a black model that was anti slip. When I chose the color I liked, I did not realize that their models didn't just change color but also features and I got a slippery hard case instead. As you change colors make sure you look at the features closely. I really liked the case if only it weren't so slippery... but wasted my money since I had to start using it until I could get a new one so I couldn't return it. In the end I bought a biodegradable one from Slimtech made of TPU
customer_reviews.author: Scott Redfern

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fits well, but creaks a little on one side.
customer_reviews.text: Used TPU cases previously, this is the first hard case I've gotten. The case is Korean made and not Chinese which is a plus, the quality of the finish is good, the shimmery white color complements the white iPhone well. The last case I had was the Incipio NGP, and this case is -- and feels substantially slimmer. The fit is tight and secure, the only minor gripe is that it creaks just a little at one corner. Note that this case leaves the top and bottom of the phone pretty exposed, but that's typical of a slim hard case. Also be aware that the case is more slippery than a soft case.
customer_reviews.author: h.h.c.

customer_reviews.title: No protection for top of phone
customer_reviews.text: There is no material along the top edge of the phone leaving it totally exposed. Same with the bottom edge though there it makes sense as the connector input and speakers are at the bottom, however there is nothing on the top edge so why not cover it? As a result most of my phone is in perfect condition except the exposed top of the phone which now has scratched and a gash in it.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my dad, as he wanted something slimmer and less bulky. He initially had an Otter Box for the protection in case of an unexpected drop. He found that case to be too bulky for his pocket, and hard to get in and out of his pocket, at that. This case was a great answer to that issue. The case is slimmer for his pockets, and also doesn't cause issues from the texture. It isn't too slick, but definitely not to resistant, either. I would definitely purchase this product again, and recommend it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Codi

customer_reviews.title: Good basic, matte case
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a basic, black case with no frills. This fits the bill. It has a sleek and professional look and is nice and thin for fitting in the back pocket. The case is pretty easy to clean off just by wiping, and is nice to hold. I haven't dropped my phone with it yet, but it seems to have less of a 'lip' than my previous case. Only time will tell if it will protect the screen from an accidental face-down drop. Either way, I'm willing to deal with the risk for the sleeker profile The ports and buttons are completely free to access.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Food those who don't like phone cases
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fitting case for great protection from scuffs and scratches. Face down it protects the screen and face up it protects the camera. I would not trust this case if I dropped my phone though... But that's the trade off for a case that's almost non existent. It really is super thin and very unobtrusive unlike most cases. If you are not a case-person, get this for the scrape protection as it does not make the phone any bigger. It also has a good feel to it and helps you hold on to it. iPhone 6's are thin and slippery by nature. Just buy it
customer_reviews.author: DeeEyeWire

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and thin
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's nice and thin, looks clean. I bought the white one. Cons: It is very slippery. Since it is so slippery, I was dropping my phone multiple times a week, which I rarely ever do to begin with. This caused the case to crack. The top right of the case completely broke off after the third drop. I had only had the case on for less than a month. Also, the case doesn't wrap around to the top of the phone, so the top (border) of the phone is now scratched and chipped away. I wouldn't recommend this case, I ended up buying a different case shortly after purchasing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Don’t drop your phone. I did once and the case had cracks in it. I thought it would be more durable, but I guess not. Awesome color though.
customer_reviews.author: Irishgirl23

customer_reviews.title: Thinnest phone case I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The color is spot on and matches my gold iPhone 6. It is extremely thin - almost as if the phone didn't have a case at all. I've been using this for months now and it's been pretty beat up, but still looks nice. I've dropped it a bunch of times, and the screen has only cracked once (the case is not encompassing, so if you were to drop it in the exact right spot, the phone screen will crack). Great option if you want an extremely thin, nice looking iPhone case.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The best of both worlds
customer_reviews.text: I like this because I don't want an Otter Box which is too bulky, but I also don't want zero protection, either. Its the best of both worlds. The back of the phone won't get scratched up, and it gives some protection if you drop it. My only minor complaint is the edges of it are a bit sharp/rough. Not "cut your hand" sharp, but they kind of dig into your hand a bit. Over time it has gotten better, but I keep wanting to take a bit of sandpaper to it to smooth it out. Don't let it stop you from buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: Feels just like the 'naked' iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I took my old case off of my phone for a while and grew to love the feel of the iPhone's aluminum casing in my hand and the slim, sleek design of the phone. I purchased this case hoping to maintain that feeling without adding much bulk. I can barely feel the size difference and the plastic of the case adds just enough friction to keep from dropping the phone but still keeps that smooth aluminum feel. It's hard to tell in the photos, but the case does rise above the camera and the screen, meaning both are protected from scratching on a table. So far I'm very happy with this case
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this case, its very slim, the cutouts are perfect, I have not dropped it but I think it will do well, the color has not faded yet so its another good sign, most white cases fade or get a dirty marks on the back of the phone pretty quickly. It protects the camera bump perfectly and it does have this black liner around it which does diffuse the flash a bit, and it does seem to help picture quality. Will update after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for people who don't like cases
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer not to have a case at all, but Apple likes making very slick products.That being said, this case is possibly the best one I've ever had for a mobile phone. It is exactly as described. Thin, easy access to buttons and input ports, and a tactile grip that doesn't get caught in a pants pocket. All at an unbeatable price. Perhaps I'm more careful than most people, but in my 20 years of owning mobile phones, I have only dropped them a handful of times and have been lucky enough (knock on wood) that they haven't cracked. If this describes you, I'm sure you'll be happy with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Harriman

customer_reviews.title: Great... until it broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: Perfect... until the case snapped after only a month of use. The thin piece at the top by the camera lens snapped off while in a pocket. Which is unfortunate, because the weight, feel, and fit of the case were exactly right.
customer_reviews.author: A. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: This case fits the phone perfectly and looks very nice on it
customer_reviews.text: This case fits the phone perfectly and looks very nice on it. The buttons are very accessible and it makes the very slim iPhone 6 a lot more comfortable in my hand. It also has a nice rubbery finish so I am much less likely to drop it. I'd recommend this case if you just want something to make your phone feel more sturdy, protect the back from scratching, and not slip out of your hand. If you drop your phone a lot this is not the case for you; It offers very little in the way of shock absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: great cover. very easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Very nice slim cover. I have the space gray phone, and the gunmetal cover almost looks like there is no cover at all. Easy to put on, and the cut outs make the buttons perfectly accessible. My only complaint is that it isn't gunmetal gray all the way through. It's a white case that is painted on the outside. I've had this case for over a year, and i can see all of the places where it's worn from sitting on a hard surface and all of the places where i've dropped it and chipped the outer layer. If it was the same color all the way through, then the scuffs wouldn't be visible.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, simple, and functional
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for about two weeks now and I have absolutely no complaints. I bought it because it was cheap, simple and had good reviews. I wasn't disappointed in any of those criteria. The case is very secure for how simple it is. It feels good to the touch, and it doesn't slip out of my hand easily. It's very easy to clean and doesn't scratch easily either. Overall, very practical and worth the money. I've already recommended to my boss who asked about it after recently upgrading to the iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect this to provide any protection to your phone
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect this to provide any protection to your phone. Look at it. Seriously. Just look at it. To those saying "I dropped it and the screen shattered." No, really? How are you surprised? Get an OtterBox or something if you want protection from fall damage. I got this case with the intention of not dropping my phone. All this case does is provide some grip. Once again, this case will not protect from any fall damage. No, not even if it falls out of your pocket. I've had this case for about 8 months, and I have yet to drop my phone.
customer_reviews.author: popcornfart

customer_reviews.title: this case has been through the ringer and it's still perfect. The soft matte finish means it doesn't show ...
customer_reviews.text: Man, this case has been through the ringer and it's still perfect. The soft matte finish means it doesn't show fingerprints or wear and tear. I love I can put the metal plate on the inside of the case and not ruin the back of my phone with it. Holds securely on my car mount, and doesn't wobble, even with my crazy driving. I just got an iPhone X and I'm sad I won't be able to use this case with it. Buy the dang thing! Won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sayhi2nhu

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all. The case material is brittle and developed stress fractures from the first time the phone was installed.
customer_reviews.text: The case material is soooo weak the first time I put the phone in the case it caused stress fractures on the corner edges. Whatever the material is...I find it to be very brittle and combined with the thin nature of the case it was tossed in the recycling bin after the first week of use.
customer_reviews.author: htcevo

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time - Pros: easy to pop on and off which I do frequently. It doesn't appear to get loose over time from this either. Its slim enough so it doesn't make the phone bulky, and provides just friction so you won't drop it. Con: The one thing I would have preferred would be a little more covering on the top and bottom along the corners ...hasn't been a problem but looks like if the phone gets dropped and lands just right it won't protect it very well. Not enough to drop a star though.
customer_reviews.author: ranman

customer_reviews.title: not the beautiful iPhone. I like that it has a opening ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very slim quality case for that gorgeous iPhone you keep in your pocket. This Spigen case maintains that slim look of your iPhone, no added thickness. I despise all other type of cases from other name brand cases that just make the phone hideous or adds extra bulk to them, those ugly cases are for Android phones, not the beautiful iPhone. I like that it has a opening for the Apple logo to be shown, it's just perfect. I'm gonna buy a few more in other colors soon. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gabezz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case - holds metal sheet for magnet holder.
customer_reviews.text: This case has everything I like - very compact, and it does not get in the way of any of the ports or buttons. Even though it is very thin, it has a grove in the inside to fit a metal sheet for a magnetic holder such as the [ASIN:B0109JIQ0W Car Mount, Spigen® [Air Vent Magnetic] Car Mount. It works seamlessly in my cars.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew's Papa

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist design, fits perfectly and looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fitting, slim, minimalist iPhone case that seems to provide decent protection for the top and bottom, good protection for the back and sides. The cover looks like it is a bit above the screen line, but I would not trust it (or any similar style case) to protect the screen. It does fit like a glove and looks cool. They cut out a bit more for the headphone jack and lightning cable, which is great. Overall, the best plastic cover I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Civez

customer_reviews.title: They are just awesome. Went with Spigen because they always have nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before my iPhone 6 did. I always get an inexpensive slim case for my phone and then put a peel-and-stick steel plate on the back for my magnetic phone holders. I have those at my desk, my car and by my bed. They are just awesome. Went with Spigen because they always have nice tight tolerances that give the phone a perfect fit with no sliding around. If you're looking for a great-fitting slim case for iPhone 6, this one works very well.
customer_reviews.author: PACoug

customer_reviews.title: it has done a very nice job of protecting my phone without adding bulk to ...
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, and gives the appearance of no case at all. Because of the curved edges of the iphone 6 it doesn't have quite the coverage that my iphone 5 case had, so I added a screen protector. Also, after two months of use, debris has become stuck between the case and phone necessitating removal of the case for cleaning. But those issues aside, it has done a very nice job of protecting my phone without adding bulk to it. And I really like the fact that my phone looks like it doesn't have a case.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: to thin breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can use the magnet on this case, IT cracked on the corner after 1 month, and now it is split. I have only been using it for 5 months and I am very easy on my devises. UGH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loree

customer_reviews.title: It is like egg shell thin
customer_reviews.text: If you want a really thin case, this is really thin. I just have my doubts that it would protect the phone very much. It is like egg shell thin. I wonder if the case itself would shatter from a drop it is so thin. I purchased the Omaker slim bumper case that was also had really good rating. I am using that one because it offers more protection it seems. I am not drop testing it and hope I never find out if they do or don't protect the phone. I am not returning it and that is why it gets the OK for me.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ho P13

customer_reviews.title: One Gentle Drop = Cracked Screen
customer_reviews.text: - Doesn't have a smooth rubbery grip like described. It's soft but not grippy like you'd expect. - The top and bottom edges are sharp. I've noticed that my pinky gets sore from texting as they test against the bottom edge of the phone. - After one gentle drop my screen is shattered. It did fall on my driveway, but the fall was only about a foot off the ground. There was no protection with this case. Overall: get an apple case or something designed with more thought.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest1701

customer_reviews.title: Simple case that keeps the phone feeling sleek
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after using the apple brand silicon case which, to me, made the sleek iPhone feel bloated and twice as big as it actually was. This case offers slick, minimalist protection that leaves the phone feeling slim and light. Just the right amount of grip to feel secure in hand, but slides into a pocket without too much friction. Have used incase snap cases on previous iPhones (those were also good cases) and this is similar, though seems actually a little higher build quality
customer_reviews.author: diggy

customer_reviews.title: Sneaky Sneaky Marketing people part 2
customer_reviews.text: Received this product...wow, good photos make it look much better than it is. I actually bought this case for my wife's phone and the Spigen Tough Armor case for my phone at the same time. As I stated in my other review, I was so disappointed in the materials I didn't even take the time to return it, I threw both of them away and went back to my Ballistic cases. In case you think I enjoy negative reviews, I don't, I want companies to succeed, (checkout all my other reviews regardless of product types).
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and fits just like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and fits just like a glove. The only downside for me is I wish it had a little more grip on it. It is very hard plastic just like the phone itself. I don't know how much protection it will give the phone if you drop it, but at least it looks nice. I gave it a 5 star for its quality, but I don't think I would buy this particular one again. I think I would get something with more of a rubber feel to it. This thing is very slippery.
customer_reviews.author: dwayne lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case - preserves the iPhone 6 rounded back feel while adding protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case. I've had this brand of case before and prefer it to others. Build quality and fit/finish are excellent. Fits the iPhone 6 contours beautifully, making it feel like there's no case at all, yet provides a nice edge on the front to keep the glass off your desk/table/whatever. Recommended for fit and finish and quality. Back has a soft rubberized feel to it that has already saved my new phone more than once in a potential drop situation.
customer_reviews.author: zippydog

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slim and sleek, looks great, fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Very slim and hugs my iPhone 6 perfectly. I mainly bought it because the iPhone 6 very easily slips out of your hand because of the smooth surface and how thin it is. This has a very nice rubbery type grip and is very sleek. I am very careful with my phones always (always work issued) and am not concerned so much about drop protection. If drop protection is your main concern, however, you may want a thicker, beefier case.
customer_reviews.author: cyak1551

customer_reviews.title: I like this. I'm a fan of SPIGEN
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I'm a fan of SPIGEN. I've had 3 cases from them before with previous phones. My only grip is that they didn't give me a screen protector like they did with the 5s cases I bought. I like the feel of the case. Not too bulky. Fits flush on the phone and it's made of this plastic that has a cloth like feel so it doesn't slip in your hands. I've had a couple drops from a few feet high and it's done it's job. I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: S. Cea

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite slim case
customer_reviews.text: Great case! bought it as a secondary case to my Apple Leather case. Pros: - THIN - simple design - great feel/touch - not too slippery, but slippery enough to slide into my pant's phone/change inside pocket. (the apple leather case is a hassle to slide in and out) - price Cons: - I would only ask for the case to continue all around the top part of the phone for extra cover protection, but i'm ok with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. RMG

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Very light and minimal case, pretty much what I wanted. Expect this to save your iPhone from scratches on the back with minimal added weight and bulk. The cases does protrude a little further than the camera protrusion, therefore also protecting the camera. 😄 The only thing that bothers me a little bit is the sharper edges on the bottom where my pinkie is used to support the phone. Other than that great case.
customer_reviews.author: Sean F Chan

customer_reviews.title: super thin but covers the areas that would most likely ...
customer_reviews.text: super thin but covers the areas that would most likely get scratched if dropped. I put a glass protector on the screen and that is it. Work really well and much cheaper than Apple brand but stil looks great. I also like the fact that it doesn't take away from the slim form of the IPhone 6. Still nice and thing. Could be a bit more grippy but not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: PKK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good case that took a while to receive. I've dropped my phone twice from decent heights and it held up pretty well; it's not scratch resistant and did end up cracking slightly at the top. Although it's not flimsy, it's not very protective but I knew that from the start. It's pretty grippy like I wanted and rests well in the hand, but also gets dirty and scratches fairly easily. It does the job and looks good for the most part, but it does lack top and bottom protection; the top and bottom of the phone are uncovered and could get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gergly

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't have any kind of ridge so the face ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have any kind of ridge so the face of the phone is exposed. If I were to drop it face down it would land on the glass. Also the pieces of it has broken off on the top corners.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Sleek case, with a few concerns.
customer_reviews.text: This case is sleek and functional, it has resisted yellowing, a common concern with clear cases. Many people don't even notice that I have a case on it! The edge does not rise far above the screen, so I'm unsure of the protection it would offer. The biggest problem I've encountered with this case is that it does not cover the top of the phone. The metal has scratched from rubbing against the metal on my jean pockets. It also allows lint to get inside the case. Overall, I like it, but the top protection could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easily scratched
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this case. It is exactly like the iPhone gold. It fits beautifully and almost disappears when on the phone. The reason for only 3 stars is that I've had it for 2 days and it already has significant scratches on the back. I'm very gentle with my electronics and the phone is never thrown in my bag or put in my pocket. 2 days is a short time to have issues. Luckily this was just temporary until I get the case that will be permanent.
customer_reviews.author: David Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and light weight. Smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: The case is rather thin. I was very optimistic in the begining as I wasn't sure if it would add any protection to handset. Of course the thin design keeps the overall profile slim. So far it has worked well. Haven't had too many falls and couple of falls I had weren't too hard. I will update the review if I find otherwise. Even though the finish is very smooth, it still doesn't feel slippery while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Shah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Simplistic! Buy Spigen Brand!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case on my phone for over a month and it fits perfectly and allows me to show the natural color of my phone without having to worry about getting scratches on it. The only issue I have is in the description of the case... It says it's scratch resistant, but I see some scratches on my case, but they don't phase me. Regardless, the case is still really nice and worth it if you've been looking for a clear case. I'm very pleased with this case and I'll look to Spigen when buying new cases!
customer_reviews.author: Kyler Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect thin case, minus bubbly apple logo
customer_reviews.text: Very minimalistic case, the clear cover for the apple logo leaves a weird bubble effect when pressed which is strange. If you want a thin case that will prevent scratches and have a lip so the camera doesn't touch surfaces when laid down this is a perfect case for you. The plastic feels almost like the original aluminum though, so it feels like almost nothing's there. Only reason it isn't 5 stars is because it's hard to take the case off and the bubbling on the apple logo.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ly

customer_reviews.title: great case for the iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: Great case for my iPhone 6. It's very light and thin so it really allows the nice design of the iPhone 6 shine. It fits very tightly to the phone so it's kind of hard if you wanted to put it on and take it off often. There's no need to take it off though because the ports are available through the case and so are the buttons. If you want a case that doesn't cover up the iPhone 6 design this is the case for you. The seller shipped soon and the item was new
customer_reviews.author: Renier Velez-cruz

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but not if you need protection
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but offer little if any drop protection. The tops and bottom are not covered and there is little screen protection. However the sides do provide a good grip. Not a good fit for me as I need something more durable. I guess I should have paid more attention.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Ghost

customer_reviews.title: An easy way to protect you iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove and protects the back of the case and lifts the front of phone slightly above the surface when face down. The case feels very nice in your hand. I was happy that I purchased one of the Invisible Shield glass protectors - they are very thin and made of very hard glass. No I know that my phone is safe during normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Embry

customer_reviews.title: Low Profile
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and felt I was prepared for the case when it arrived. The lip is annoying, but I soon found that almost all other cases are even worse. It's raised just enough to protect the screen from a flat surface, and so far it has worked well to protect the phone while remaining very minimal. I periodically take it off and clean inside. I purchased the black one that has a softer texture; gives a lot of grip. I would recommend it if you want something very low profile.
customer_reviews.author: dub

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice looking minimalistic case - real protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought it last month and since then I am in love with it. The case is very sleek and nice looking. The protection was tested last night when I dropped my phone from about 4 feet height on sidewalk with face down. There was no damage to the phone as the sides are slightly raised. This is really a sturdy and great looking protective case. Thumbs Up!!
customer_reviews.author: kausik sarkar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case but provide no grip whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: The quality, fit, and looks are very good. This case does not provide any drop protection whatsoever. The biggest con for me is that the plastic is rather slick and does not aid your grip. I dropped the phone once in the first 4 days of handling it, but am learning to adjust. I like it that the buttons are not covered up and thus the case doesn't get in the way. Because of the slipperiness of the case, I just may have to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: TheMinimal

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but a little weaker than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice case indeed. It fits seamlessly, has a nice touch and it's thin. It fits very tight on the phone, so you'll have some trouble while removing it. I don't think it's a con, though. My only complaint is that the thin plastics above the buttons holes are very sensitive. I broke it the first time I tried to remove the case. So you need to be careful with it. I'm a tech guy, and I'm very careful with my devices. I don't think it was my fault when it broke. In a nutshell: it's a nice case, but not that resistant to cracks.
customer_reviews.author: marcos bandeira de albertin

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been a good case. I've had it on my phone for ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a good case. I've had it on my phone for about a month now. It basically protects your phone from scratches, I don't see it doing much to prevent damage from a fall. I like how you have access to the real volume/power buttons on the phone. What I really like about it is how my phone is able to fit in my cup holder with it on. I had a thicker case before that prevented this.
customer_reviews.author: Annon

customer_reviews.title: I really love this case
customer_reviews.text: I really love this case. It is so sleek and thin that I have had numerous people tell me that all I need now for my phone is a case and I will be all set lol. Even though this case is thin it still seems to be very sturdy and protective. I took only one star off Bc I feel like They could of covered the top of the iPhone and the bottom with a little bit of plastic. Although maybe when they tested it this didn't work. It just seems like that section of exposed metal is going to be prone to scratching
customer_reviews.author: PC_Rick

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, it shows off my phone, and it almost disappears when its on. I love the fact that I no longer get a hazy picture when I use flash because of the diffuse around the camera. It's open on the bottom and doesn't interfere with any accessories I have. While it doesn't offer the BEST protection, this is the SLIM series and you can clearly see in the picture what the case looks like. Snapped on my phone like a dream, I like the fact that all the buttons have cut outs so I can press them without fuss.
customer_reviews.author: christy v

customer_reviews.title: This is a great thin and simple case that fits the iPhone 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thin and simple case that fits the iPhone 6 very well. I am not a fan of big, bulky cases, so something like this is perfect for me. Almost feels like there is not a case on it at all. The material is a kind of firm rubbery plastic that feels great in the hand. Overall I would recommend this case to anyone looking like a thin, no-frills, but quality case.
customer_reviews.author: John Farley

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case 5 months ago and it's protected my phone through quite a fair share of drops, bumps, and hits. Thin and light, easy to clean, and still feel like I have a grip when I'm holding my phone. So what should a case do? It has done a good job protecting my phone, especially since it creates a small lip around the screen to protect it from corner drops. Easy to put on and take off for cleaning. Thin so it doesn't look like I have a Texas Instruments calculator in my pocket. Very functional and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Cookiemonstar

customer_reviews.title: Nice, slim case adds protection and grip without the bulk
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of cases, but with the past few iPhones, I felt that I needed one just so it wouldn't slide out of my hand. I've always gone as minimalistic as possible, such as the InCase Snap on my iPhone 5. This case is exactly what I needed. While retail stores in the area had bulky, poorly constructed cases for $35+, this case is very reasonably priced and is perfect for my needs. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sleek Smooth Slim Case
customer_reviews.text: I'd buy this again. Very sleek, feel of the case is smooth and so far seems very durable. I've had it on my phone for about 2 weeks and no problems to be seem. If anything I like to hold it in my hand more now than before! It definitely FITS right on the phone, perfectly snug and keep the slim look and feel that made you want the new iPhone 6 in the first place. Great buy if you're looking to show off your iPhone and protect it :) Highly recommend to anyone looking for a sleek new case.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit. The reason for 4 instead of 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit. The reason for 4 instead of 5 stars, as stated by other Purchasers not much coverage on the corners. It does make it easier to hang onto the Phone due to the rubberized texture. As a note to Apple-I don't understand why You can't make a less slippery surface of the Phone to start with. Since We've purchased this case, I haven't dropped the Phone. Best- PawPaw Cabe
customer_reviews.author: Carey M. Cabe

customer_reviews.title: Survived Tumble to Pavement
customer_reviews.text: I mostly wanted a case that provided more grip since the standalone iPhone 6 is so slippery. This is a great slender case that doesn't add bulk while improving the grip. And after my phone just took a tumble off my lap onto the street with no damage to my phone, I thought I'd write a review. I should add that I also had the iPhone screen protector from Maxboost, which was smashed in multiple places after the tumble. But the combination of the screen protector and this case seems to have worked pretty well since my phone is completely unharmed. Now I just have to order another Maxboost protector and write a review for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Wow...lots of hate for this case, which I don't really understand.
customer_reviews.text: I got the Crystal Clear version, and it fits really well. It is *very* minimal, so if you're prone to drop or abuse your phone, it may not be for you. For me, it's a balancing act between aesthetics and protection, and for me, this case does a good job of making it seem like I'm still using an iPhone, and not a plastic brick. It's starting to scratch a little bit, but it's minimal and expected.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rosa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this phone case!
customer_reviews.text: I have the gold iPhone 6 and this is the exact color of my phone. Between that and it being so slim, I can't really even tell I have a cover on it! It is slick and wouldn't really offer much in the way of protection from drops; but if you're looking for something to keep your phone from getting dings and scratches while still maintaining the slim line of the iPhone, this is an excellent option!
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Have had 4 and all of them cracked at corner after 6 mos
customer_reviews.text: Have had four of these and each lasted about 6 mos before cracking at the corners. In long run it's cheaper to buy the Apple leather case. But these have helped protect the phone from wear.
customer_reviews.author: WMoore

customer_reviews.title: This is a great slim case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great slim case, but it does not protect all edges. Dropped my phone and it landed on an unprotected edge, shattering the screen. Not a defect in this product, but be sure you know what you are buying.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heddings

customer_reviews.title: think again
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks but everytime when I drop my phone, case is breaking to a pice or cracking. I ended up buying a new rubber/plastic case.
customer_reviews.author: Onur Arca

customer_reviews.title: An incredible price for what I consider the best case I've bought
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have "bumper edges" which keep me from moving apps to different pages. The grip is important for my small hands and the size of the iPhone 6. I drop my phone all the time from clumsiness (not from losing the grip) and have not had any damage. Also bought one for my son who doesn't believe in protective cases, and he's thrilled with the unobtrusiveness.
customer_reviews.author: PattyO

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and non-slip enough
customer_reviews.text: I only tried two slim cases for the iPhone 6 (this and Noot's) and this one I found to be better only because of the non-slip attribute. Both were very thin and offer little protection, but the material used here was far less slippery than the other option I chose. So if you're looking for a less slippery slim case for the iPhone 6, I think this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kenton W. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Built in space for iMagnet plate.
customer_reviews.text: I did not know this when I ordered it, but it features a built-in sunk area in the back for a magnet plate. My iMagnet square plate fits perfectly. Additionally, it has the matte non-slip surface and minimal size I love.
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: Provides a reasonable grip, and is not designed for drop protection
customer_reviews.text: This is not a drop-protection case, and it is not advertised as such. It's a thin profile case which provides a reasonable grip for holding what is otherwise a very slippery phone. It does protect from scratches that could occur putting the phone down or sliding it across surfaces or in/out of a pocket. I'm very pleased with this product, it does exactly what was described.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice; Performs So-so.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case as the first case for my new iPhone 6. It looks sharp, but I have two issues with it: - Because the top is open, it does still allow the phone to pull your hair occasionally. - The texture (or lack thereof) doesn't really allow the phone to stick to any surface. It slid around a lot. With that said, I've switched to another case that is rubber. It has solved my two issues.
customer_reviews.author: mfrazier

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: It's thin and seems quite durable. There are no thin metal pieces that break easily as in previous versions. WELL DONE>
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Slim but slippery
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice and slim so doesn't take away from the elegance of iphone 6. The reason I took one star is because it's slippery. I wanted something that had a grip. I chose this one because I like the logo window in the back, the logo shield I guess is the proper term. Until more cases will be produced for iPhone 6 this one will do just fine. So if you don't care about the grip, it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Astharteea

customer_reviews.title: I stopped using this phone case almost as soon as ...
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using this phone case almost as soon as I got it. It's far too slippery. It was causing me to drop my phone more often than I normally would because it had no tactile grip on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Burke

customer_reviews.title: 2 Times Was Enough for me!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought 2 of these in the past--each after a very short period of time the plastic near the volume controls would crack and break off. Also what I didn't like was the see through covering leaves a square light film on the iphone glass. I wouldn't recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: SOCA

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture and fits well. It's not going to offer much drop protection of course, but it will stop the back and sides from getting scratched and dinged in daily use. Downsides are lack of protection on the top and the case itself gets marred pretty easily. I do like the lack of coverage on the bottom; many cases don't consider that people may want to connect headphones with larger plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Francis

customer_reviews.title: I had just bought the Incipio Feather shine and hated the front of the case
customer_reviews.text: First, I only found this item because of a product suggestion email from Amazon. Well played. I had just bought the Incipio Feather shine and hated the front of the case. I look for minimal cases that try to not ruin the look of the iPhone and the Spigen does this really well. It is light, thin, and has a nice matte grip. It probably isn't going to protect it from really violent drops, but should do for those clumsy days. This one should come up in searches higher up in the results!
customer_reviews.author: David Ngau

customer_reviews.title: Thin, feels quality and fits pefectly.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great case. I don't generally like cases on my iphones but this is a good alternative. It's very thin and contours the shape of the phone well. It's perfectly clear so you still can appreciate the design of the phone. I won't keep it on the phone forever but this will keep me a bit more confident for the early life of the phone, till I lose some of the paranoia of dropping it.
customer_reviews.author: mgarciaad

customer_reviews.title: Slim but safe
customer_reviews.text: So many case options out there...I've gone thru over a dozen different cases since owning my first iPhone in 2008. This Spigen case has been my favorite as it's lasted the longest (over 2-years), is super slim, has a really nice feel to it, and most importantly has done its job in PROTECTING my iPhone from dozens of clumsy drops!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: with the Elago being a little sharper and slightly less comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: Got both this and Elago's of similar nature, the tactile stuff. Very similar, but Spigen has slightly more beveled edges, with the Elago being a little sharper and slightly less comfortable to hold. Both the same in terms of "grippy-ness". However, dealing with both companies, Elago's customer service was fantastic, while Spigen's was slow and clunky.
customer_reviews.author: JMO1974

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. As described. Does not add any bulk to your phone yet it gives a sense of protection. I haven't dropped my phone yet so I can't judge how effective it is but I feel the edges of the cover wrap around the edge of the screen just about enough to prevent cracking. It does not inteefere with the touch screen at all. Most importantly perhaps, the black version has a very subtle rubberized surface that adds to your grip and makes it more secure. The design is elegant and fits really well with the beautiful phone. I would buy this same product again over any of the other covers that I'm starting to see come out.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Correa

product_meta.title: Spigen Thin Fit Designed for Apple iPhone 6s Case/Designed for iPhone 6 Case (2014) - Smooth Black
feature_bullets: Defined fit keeps device slim and lightweight
Hard case made from premium polycarbonate & Feels case-less and bare for a natural impression
Exposed buttons and port openings for quick and easy access
For Smooth Black Only: Soft finish coating provides grip and a matte-finish
iPhone 6 Case Compatible with Apple iPhone 6 (2014)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars8,811 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
